name: Bigger picture (RikSnoep, mardt, Keiikou, OppoOtis)
description:
You can read more about our game and process here:  https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1d4D2sZGU8hH_unp5R-KiOjcThdbFHsXEkTEqrP1B...

Free play gamemode

Prompt 1: Write a yes/no statement
Prompt 2: Write yes/no consequences for the assigned statement
Voting: Vote for what you think the person who wrote the prompts would have marked as the "best" option

Sustainability gamemode

Prompt 1: Write a proposal for a project that would aid one of the sustainable development goals.
Prompt 2: Write the pros and cons to accepting or denying the assigned proposal.
Voting: Vote on whether or not you think the proposal should be accepted, and discuss why !
